class.name: SolidShape2D
class.description: A SolidShape2D is defined by a Shape2D and can be filled with color. Use Node2D's transform to change the size. The shape will be drawn to the screen.

members.member: This is the shape that will be drawn. Default value: [code]None[/code].
The shape's fill color. Default value: [code]White[/code].
